alert.note: Alert for Assumption; Lower Jefferson; Lower Terrebonne; St. Charles; St. John The Baptist; Upper Lafourche; Upper Terrebonne (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 06 at 12:59PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central St. John The Baptist, St. Charles, northeastern Terrebonne, northern Lafourche, central Jefferson and southeastern Assumption Parishes through 145 PM CDT... At 1259 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Luling to 8 miles east of Amelia. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Houma, Thibodaux, Hahnville, Larose, Lockport, Jean Lafitte, Mathews, Schriever, Paradis, Gray, Des Allemands, Lafitte, Luling, Boutte, Raceland, Bayou Gauche, Destrehan, Barataria, Bayou Cane and New Sarpy. This includes Interstate 310 between mile markers 6 and 11. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Assumption; Lower Jefferson; Lower Terrebonne; St. Charles; St. John The Baptist; Upper Lafourche; Upper Terrebonne
